reviews.review: beğenmediğim yanı çok fazla güncelleme geliyor

It is one of the best competitive games out there. I have been playing the series for almost 20 years, since the 1.3 era. But in order to get the most out of it, you have to rely on external services like, ESEA or Faceit, as cheating is horrendous. If you live in Oceanic region, there aren't many players playing the game and it has its ups and downs. The bad thing is that it would be nearly impossible to find a match during early in the morning or at night. The good thing is since there are only a few players, you start to know them, specially in the case of using Faceit. Even with the old price, I would recommend this game, and you should definitely try it out since it is free to play now. Just beware of the cheaters and use Faceit. 

Overall, this is the only game that I never got bored of. It is easy to learn, hard to master. The more you understand and learn, harder and more rewarding it will get.
